# beget_compute_snapshot (Resource)

Beget Compute Snapshot resource. Manages point-in-time backups of compute instances for restoration and cloning



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `compute_instance_id` (String) Compute Instance ID for which snapshot is created

### Optional

- `description` (String) Snapshot description

### Read-Only

- `compute_instance_name` (String) Compute Instance Name for which snapshot is created
- `configuration` (Attributes) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--configuration))
- `date_create` (String) Date create
- `id` (String) Snapshot ID
- `region` (String) Snapshot region
- `size` (String) Snapshot size
- `status` (String) Current status (`CREATING`,`DONE`,`RESTORING`,`DELETED`,`ERROR`)

<a id="nestedatt--configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `configuration`

Read-Only:

- `cpu` (Number)
- `disk_mb` (Number)
- `ram_mb` (Number)
